Align Items

# Align Items

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support        |
| ---------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
items-start
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
items-end
```      | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
items-center
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
items-baseline
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
items-stretch
```  | ✅ Full Support |
